welcome.title: Welcome to Debezium Platform!
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour of the platform. You can skip ahead at any time.

sidebarNav.title: Navigation
sidebarNav.content: Use the sidebar to navigate between the main sections: Pipelines, Sources, Transforms, Destinations, Connections, and Vaults.

pipelineNav.title: Pipelines
pipelineNav.content: This is where you manage your data pipelines â€” the core of the platform.

sourceNav.title: Sources
sourceNav.content: Define source connections to capture data change events from your databases.

destinationNav.title: Destinations
destinationNav.content: Specify where the platform delivers captured data changes.

connectionNav.title: Connections
connectionNav.content: Manage connections to your sources and destinations.

themeSelector.title: Theme
themeSelector.content: Switch between light, dark, or system themes to suit your preference.

addPipeline.title: Create a Pipeline
addPipeline.content: Start by creating your first pipeline to stream change events from a source to a destination.
